con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion - Valid HTTP Status code

con:config.script:
import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def transactionEligibleEventAttrId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'TransactionEligible\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def visitsEventAttrId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'Visits\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

con:property.con:name: JsonBody
con:property.con:value: { "EventAttributeId": "${transactionEligibleEventAttrId#result}", "AttributeName": "TransactionEligible", "CyclicIndicator": true, "CapIndicator": false, "CyclicMapField": "EligibleRevenue", "IsLineItem": false, "CollectionIndicator": false, "DataTypeDrl": "Double", "DataTypeUi": "Number", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "AttributeFqn": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible", "DroolsVariableName": "$PurchaseTxn", "CollectionAttribute": false, "UsedAsCyclic": false, "ReturnAttribute": false, "IsValueGroupHierarchy": false, "IsEnrichmentLinkedAttribute": false, "IsEnrichmentAttribute": false, "Status": "A" }

con:property.con:name: JsonBody
con:property.con:value: { "EventAttributeId": "${visitsEventAttrId#result}", "AttributeName": "Visits", "CyclicIndicator": true, "CapIndicator": false, "CyclicMapField": "Visits", "IsLineItem": false, "CollectionIndicator": false, "DataTypeDrl": "Double", "DataTypeUi": "Number", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "AttributeFqn": "PurchaseTxn.Visits", "DroolsVariableName": "$PurchaseTxn", "CollectionAttribute": false, "UsedAsCyclic": false, "ReturnAttribute": false, "IsValueGroupHierarchy": false, "IsEnrichmentLinkedAttribute": false, "IsEnrichmentAttribute": false, "Status": "A" }

con:property.con:name: CreateBody
UpdateBody

con:restRequest.name: Scenario1-ProcessTransaction

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion for HTTP status code
